NOTE:    It's event for USERS:  it informs about new message sent from program."},"MessageQueueingRequested(bytes32,address,bytes,uint128)":{"details":"Emitted when a new message is sent to be queued. NOTE:    It's event for USERS:  it informs about new reply sent from program."},"ReplyQueueingRequested(bytes32,address,bytes,uint128)":{"details":"Emitted when a new reply is sent and requested to be verified and queued. NOTE: It's event for USERS: it informs about state changes."},"ValueClaimed(bytes32,uint128)":{"details":"Emitted when a user succeed in claiming value request and receives balance.
